metadata.title: Wednesday, 20th October, 2021
metadata.session: FIRST SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to tar the Luwingu-Nsombo-Chaba road in Northern Province;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(d) what the estimated time frame for the completion of the project is.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate the silos in Natuseko Site and Service in Kabwe District; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.
(a) when the construction of science laboratories at the following Secondary Schools in Mufumbwe Parliamentary Constituency will be completed:
(b) what the cause of the delay in completing the project is. ___________________________
